name: Villain Adviser
description:
Hi, I'm Myek with my first complete visual novel, Villain Adviser :)

It's also my first Kickstarter project, so if you were a backer, I thank you to the sun and beyond. £60 was raised, which means I can buy 60 multi packs of Hula Hoops. 

It was originally meant to be a two month summer project, but it ended up taking six months, haha... I severely underestimated how much work goes into making visual novels and I just didn't think it'd take this long.

But no matter! It hath been released and I think it's alright for a first attempt. I'm proud of it. It's my child, my baby. Even if it's a little ugly, I won't let anyone say I shouldn't have given birth to it.

I hope you enjoy it. Thank you! Ciao~~

-Myek
